description: This CSS file contains variables and styles for managing themes in a web application, defining styles for light and dark themes, as well as various components such as the application header and theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling, centers content with a responsive design and applies theme colors.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including rotation animation for visual effects.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the application header, positioning elements and controlling layout properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links in the application, with transition effects on color changes.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button including positioning, colors, and hover effects.
